name: David Bullock
text: Went from being able to.order delivery less than a week ago, to NO DELIVERY AVAILABLE.  Super didappdisapp since I enjoyed the pizza.  My location is UNDER three miles away...

name: Khizar Qureshi
text: Really quick service and clean from the inside. Plenty of space and tables to eat. There is a nice fountain drink and utensil station with some cheeze and red pepper to sprinkle on the pizza as well.

name: Dipankar Ganguli
text: The employees always been very fast and courteous. This is the only place close to us not sure why are they closing the outlet leaving many people jobless.

name: GEO MASS
text: Theres always something good under their roof.

name: Ben W
text: I placed a delivery order from this place, and they delivered somebody else’s order to my house.  I mentioned this in this survey they automatically send after deliveries, and Pizza Hut corporate sent me a code for a free pizza. When I …More

name: Fatou Sow
text: The employees are really helpful and fast. They are always ready to greet me when I walk in and quick to give me my food. I always feel at home going there.

name: Joyce Bouchard
text: Clean, courteous, helpful.  Pizza was on time and hot!  Friendly staff.

name: Nitalia Naeem
text: Niara is the kindest staff member at this Pizza hut! She is sooo sweet and so kind! Always has my order ready on time!

name: Tom Wilson
text: Terrible service. I went to pick up my order and it was cancelled. Manager had an attitude and extremely poor customer service skills. I will not be coming back to this pizza hut.

name: Richard Gollen
text: Disrespectful to their customers and their own employees. Half of which don't even know what their doing

name: Paul Lanton
text: Meh. It's a nice, clean Pizza Hut Express. No lunch buffet and pretty small. The only reason to go to Pizza Hut is for the lunch pizza buffet. They're the only ones who make edible pizza that still offer a lunch buffet. If that's something they're moving away from, then I'll not have a need or desire to go to Pizza Hut evermore.

name: Nishant Trivedi
text: The Pizza's are good but not always standard as it depends on the one who prepares it. Mostly no rush place and one gets thier order on time...especially carry out.

name: John Michael
text: Very good and good price

name: Kylie Brennan
text: I’d give it no stars. I went in there and ordered a small pizza and they said it wouldn’t take long. And I almost waited 40 minutes for A SMALL PIZZA. It should take ten. The service was terrible! They were just fooling around and not doing …More

name: Dannelle Gansowski
text: Love the thin and crispy pizza

name: Kelly DiDomenick
text: We went in around 6pm last night and we each wanted the 2 slice meal (cheese pizza). The gal at the counter told us that she only had 1 slice of pepperoni. Didn't offer to make any despite the fact that they were out of pizza. Can't …More

name: Ms. April Boynton
text: Try the garlic butter crust #sogood

name: jessica smyth
text: Friendly staff and speedy service. Food was fresh and hot....

name: Aamir A.
text: I ordered bread sticks and a 8-piece wings medium, they estimated me 30 minutes for delivery. They took 1 hour, to top it off, my location is campus & quad directly behind there location..& I only received 6 of the 8 wings. I'll take my time and pick up from wolf next time.

name: Orange Joe
text: After multiple attempts at making this my go-to for pizza, I've finally given up. There's no hope: UAlbany is literally the only reason this place exists. All their (inattentive, loud, lazy, rude) employees are all UAlbany kids and the VAST …More

name: David Ortiz
text: My pastor came in a tray with no lid and so they threw it in a small cardboard box used for cinnasticks. Pasta cheese and sauce all over the box and not in the tray as it should be.

name: mikefoley89
text: Went in an hour before close as I was passing through town on the way home. Stood at the register for 15 mins watching people look at me in the kitchen while they clean before walking out and getting awesome pizza across the street @ Torino pizza & pasta.  Don't waste your time with poor custom

name: Chris Ormatar
text: After the extremely poor service we have received at this Pizza Hut, we said we would never use them again. However, we got a "Free Pizza" coupon for the poor service and we decided to give them one more try (I'm sure you already know how …More

name: Carla Dortic
text:
Their Hershey cookies are super creepy. I bought two pieces and they were ice cold and tasted stale plus they were crumpled up in foil.
Everything else was rather disappointing.

name: CoviD Boys
text: Ordered my food they said 45 mins wait it was 2 hours late and ice cold I called the store the manager Tony hung up on me

name: Ben Diana Matheson
text: Despite an initial disappointment when we went in to pick up a 'very light cheese on half' pie which turned out to be all normal cheese, the manager James not only personally made a replacement pie which was just perfect, but also gave us a credit for a future pie which was very much appreciated. Thanks!

name: Leo Gardner
text: The crew of this resturant is awful service is awful. They do everything half assed

name: Joe Maloney
text: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!  The Manager is RUDE, DISRESPECTFUL, AND HUNG UP ON ME TWICE!!  The pizza was piss poor and the customer service is horrible.  Didn't accept a coupon even though another Pizza Hut (wolf rd) accepted it gladly.  THEN …More

name: Sal Bell
text: Great service and fast

name: Cassandra Losee
text: I've always liked Pizza Hut pizza. However, the service here is terrible. The employees were fighting in the back of the kitchen, so it took almost 10 minutes to get their attention. Once we put in the order, we waited half an hour for a luke warm pizza.

name: Derick Coutinho
text: Had a take out. Good service

name: Yaman Cae
text: Usually fast in and out, depending on time

name: Glenn
text: Location is closed

name: Richard Roomberg
text: delivery 30 minutes late.  No one picks up the phone for the last 30 minutes.  These people are the worst.

name: celdragonus
text: They weren't as good as Union St in Schenectady, don't believe I'll return, I take my stuffed crust seriously.

name: Brandon Chadwick
text: Got pizza from there had a piece gum stuck in the box.

name: Jay North
text: Great!

name: Yuliia Oliinyk
text: The service is terrible!

name: Rayna Swann
text: Good food

name: Tereance Lynch
text: Average pizza

name: fun boy
text: Quick service ...

name: Devon Greene
text: Terrible place to order from food came cold and wings didn't have any buffalo sauce !!!

name: Sarah Hussein
text: Great service!
